description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Tearing

Note: Space Marines Only. Relic Master-Crafted Astartes Bolter (Godwyn) of the Blood Angels. If the weapon has killed an enemy within the last 12 hours, fireer gains +10 to Willpower Tests to resist the Blood Angels' "Bloodlust" curse.If the bearer suffers from the Red Thirst, they also receive +15 to BS during this time. If the weapon has not killed within 12 hours, the bearer suffers -10 to resist the Bloodlust curse, -5 to all Fellowship Tests, and if they suffer the Red Thirst +10 to WS and -10 to BS.
